channel.title: Wax on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Wax on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnCER1-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnCER1-2 Gene Name: Brassica napus clone CER1-2 aldehyde decarbonylase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnKCS1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnKCS1-1 Gene Name: Brassica napus 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnKCS1-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnKCS1-2 Gene Name: Brassica napus 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of BnKCS1-1, BnKCS1-2, and BnCER1-2 promotes cuticular wax production and increases drought tolerance in Brassica napus.

item.title: Cgl2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bol013612 Gene Symbol: Cgl2 Gene Name: Cabbage glossy 2 Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: Cgl2 plays an essential role in cuticular wax biosynthesis in cabbage.

item.title: CsKCS20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs9g07970.1 Gene Symbol: CsKCS20 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Function and transcriptional regulation of CsKCS20 in the elongation of very-long-chain fatty acids and wax biosynthesis in Citrus sinensis flavedo.

item.title: CsMYB96
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g10670.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB96 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transcription factor 96 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB96 confers resistance to water loss in citrus fruit by simultaneous regulation of water transport and wax biosynthesis.

item.title: CsSEC23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5G585430 Gene Symbol: CsSEC23 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: MutMap, genotyping, and gene editing results demonstrated that CsSEC23, which is the core component of COPII vesicles, mediates the glossiness of cucumber fruit peel.

item.title: CsWAX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa020530 Gene Symbol: CsWAX2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber Genome Database (http://cucumber.

item.title: CsZFP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_5g028870 Gene Symbol: CsZFP6 Gene Name: Genome: CuGenDB Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber glossy fruit 1 (CsGLF1) encodes the zinc finger protein 6 (CsZFP6) that regulates fruit glossiness by enhancing cuticular wax biosynthesis.

item.title: FIS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g007570 Gene Symbol: FIS1 Gene Name: FIRM SKIN 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: HvKCS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G063420.2 Gene Symbol: HvKCS1 Gene Name: β-Ketoacyl-CoA Synthase 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The β-Ketoacyl-CoA Synthase HvKCS1, Encoded by Cer-zh, Plays a Key Role in Synthesis of Barley Leaf Wax and Germination of Barley Powdery Mildew.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: MdKCS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1087400 Gene Symbol: MdKCS1 Gene Name: Malus domestica β-KETOACYL-COA SYNTHASE 1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1051000 Gene Symbol: MdMYB30 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB94
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000144744 Gene Symbol: MdMYB94 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: MdGH3.

item.title: MdSCE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1286800 Gene Symbol: MdSCE1 Gene Name: Malus domestica SUMO E2 CONJUGATING ENZYME 1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdSHINE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000178263 Gene Symbol: MdSHINE2 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple AP2/EREBP transcription factor MdSHINE2 confers drought resistance by regulating wax biosynthesis.

item.title: MdSIZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1131700 Gene Symbol: MdSIZ1 Gene Name: SAP AND MIZ1 DOMAIN CONTAINING LIGASE1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: NtLTP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtLTP1 Gene Name: Non-specific lipid-transfer protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Tobacco NtLTP1, a glandular-specific lipid transfer protein, is required for lipid secretion from glandular trichomes.

item.title: PpGS1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpGS1.1 Gene Name: Glutamine synthetase Genome: Species: Poa pratensis Functional Descriptions: Glutamine synthetase gene PpGS1.

item.title: SlMYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g116100 Gene Symbol: SlMYB31 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: StKCS6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StKCS6 Gene Name: 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase 6 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of StKCS6 in potato periderm leads to reduced chain lengths of suberin and wax compounds and increased peridermal transpiration.

item.title: StNAC103
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StNAC103 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 103 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of the potato StNAC103 gene enhances the accumulation of suberin polyester and associated wax in tuber skin.

item.title: TaCHR729-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCHR729-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CHD3 protein TaCHR729 regulates the cuticular wax biosynthesis required for stimulating germination of Blumeria graminis f.

item.title: TaCHR729-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCHR729-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CHD3 protein TaCHR729 regulates the cuticular wax biosynthesis required for stimulating germination of Blumeria graminis f.

item.title: TaCHR729-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCHR729-D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CHD3 protein TaCHR729 regulates the cuticular wax biosynthesis required for stimulating germination of Blumeria graminis f.

item.title: TaKCS6-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaKCS6-A Gene Name: 3-KETOACYL-CoA SYNTHASE Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Identified wheat 3-KETOACYL-CoA SYNTHASE (TaKCS6), a homolog of barley HvKCS6, as a key enzyme in the biosynthesis of wheat cuticular wax.

item.title: TaKCS6-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaKCS6-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Identified wheat 3-KETOACYL-CoA SYNTHASE (TaKCS6), a homolog of barley HvKCS6, as a key enzyme in the biosynthesis of wheat cuticular wax.

item.title: TaKCS6-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaKCS6-D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Identified wheat 3-KETOACYL-CoA SYNTHASE (TaKCS6), a homolog of barley HvKCS6, as a key enzyme in the biosynthesis of wheat cuticular wax.

item.title: VvCBF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvCBF4 Gene Name: C-repeat binding protein 4 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: To overcome such production losses, a recently identified grapevine C-repeat binding factor (CBF) gene, VvCBF4, was overexpressed in grape vine cv.

item.title: Woolly
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g080260 Gene Symbol: Woolly Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: ZmFDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb328280 Gene Symbol: ZmFDL1|ZmMYB94 Gene Name: fused leaves1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZxABCG11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZxABCG11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Zygophyllum xanthoxylum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of ZxABCG11 alters the phenotype and cuticle ultrastructure of leaves in alfalfa.
